testcase.name: Verify User able to login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user launch chrome Browser............................................passed Then User browse application URL "http://demowebshop.tricentis.com/"........passed Then Login Link should display..............................................passed When user clicks on Login link.............................................passed Then User enters email as "test@kuna.com" and password as "test@123"........passed And User click on login button..............................................passed And Home page title should be "Demo Web Shop "..............................passed And Close Browser...........................................................passed
